sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable no-unused-vars */ import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { faAws, faDocker, faGitAlt, faGolang, faJsSquare, faPython, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import './index.scss' const About = () => { const aboutArray = 'About Me'.split('') const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 2000) return () => clearTimeout(timer) }, []) return ( <>

Hey there! I’m a Cloud Security Engineer and DevOps enthusiast from Lahore, Pakistan 🌍. I graduated with a BSc in Computer Science 🎓, and I’m always excited to learn new things and push myself to be the best I can be 📚💡. I thrive on solving tough technical challenges and building secure, scalable cloud infrastructures 🔒☁️. My experience spans across AWS, Google Cloud, DigitalOcean, Linode, and Vultr enivornments, where I focus on optimizing the workflows using tools like Docker, Kubernetes, PHP, Bash, and Python 🛠️🚀. I’m passionate about creating high-performance systems ⚡, troubleshooting real-time issues 🧩, and ensuring security is baked in at every stage 🔐.

Currently, I’m working as a Cloud Engineer at DigitalOcean, where I manage 24/7 infrastructure 🌐, continuously improving our systems through innovation and automation ⚙️💻. I hold certifications such as Google Cloud Professional Cloud Security Engineer, Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect and AWS Certified Security Specialty(Whizlabs), which help me stay ahead of industry trends and deliver the best results 🎯📈. If you’re looking for someone who loves both technology and creative problem-solving 🤔💡, and is committed to building strong, collaborative teams 🤝💪, I’d love to connect and see how we can work together 🤗. Let’s make great things happen! 🌟🔥

) } export default About
